title: Optimizing Django ORM Queries for High Performance
excerpt: Database hits can kill your app's performance. Learn how to use select_related and prefetch_related to optimize your Django APIs.

title: A Beginner's Guide to Dynamic Programming
excerpt: Struggling with DP? I break down the core concepts of memoization and tabulation with the classic Knapsack problem.

title: Deploying Machine Learning Models with FastAPI
excerpt: Bridging the gap between Data Science and Web Dev. A step-by-step guide to serving your Scikit-learn models via API.

title: Understanding REST API Best Practices
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to designing RESTful APIs that are intuitive, scalable, and developer-friendly.

title: Mastering Graph Algorithms
excerpt: From BFS and DFS to Dijkstra's algorithm - a complete guide to solving graph problems in competitive programming.

title: Building Real-time Applications with WebSockets
excerpt: Learn how to implement bi-directional communication between client and server for real-time features.

title: Introduction to Neural Networks
excerpt: Demystifying deep learning by building a neural network from scratch using only NumPy.

title: Docker for Python Developers
excerpt: Containerize your Python applications with Docker and Docker Compose for consistent development environments.

title: Solving the Two Pointer Pattern
excerpt: Master one of the most useful patterns in coding interviews with practical examples and problem-solving strategies.
